description: Certified models meet all ENERGY STAR requirements as listed in the Version 4.0 ENERGY STAR Program Requirements for Furnaces that are effective as of February 1, 2013. A detailed listing of key efficiency criteria are available at http://www.energystar.gov/index.cfm?c=furnaces.pr_crit_furnaces

name: ENERGY STAR Certified Furnaces
